Desc.entry: Working toward a thriving and healthy Black and Minority Ethnic Voluntary, Community and Faith sector in Sheffield for the 21st century. Aims to establish and sustain a strong and valued BME infrastructure organisation in Sheffield that will be open, effective, inclusive and accountable, that will vigorously articulate the news and concerns of the BME VCF sector organisations. The network will robustly scrutinize decision making, lobby, campaign and champion the interests and aspirations of its members.

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - GENERAL SUPPORT ORGANISATIONS
